mapper.select: select mealcard.mealnum, mealcard.unum, mealcard.date, TIME_FORMAT(mealcard.time, '%H:%i') as time, mealinfo.menu, mealinfo.intake, mealinfo.kcal from mealcard left join mealinfo on mealcard.mealnum = mealinfo.mealnum where unum = #{unum} order by date desc, time asc
mapper.insert: insert into mealcard(unum, date, time, total_kcal) values(#{unum}, #{date}, #{time}, #{totalKcal})
insert into mealinfo(mealnum, menu, intake, kcal) values(#{mealnum}, #{menu}, #{intake}, #{kcal})
